c1.name: Dreams of the Foamy Deep
c1.descriptionRaw: The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will be increased by 15%.
c1.description: The CRIT Rate of Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure will be increased by 15%.

c2.name: Penguins and the Land of Plenty
c2.descriptionRaw: Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.
c2.description: Unleashing Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.

c3.name: Song of the Eddies and Bleached Sands
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Dance of the Snowy Moon and Flute
c4.descriptionRaw: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.
c4.description: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

c5.name: Nights of Hearth and Happiness
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Pressurized Floe by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
c6.descriptionRaw: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.
c6.description: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.
